function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Continuous cleaning and sterilization practices may not be effective in preventing the spread of contagious diseases if not done properly or if the cleaning products used are not effective against the specific pathogen.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and contamination of surfaces.","Mitigation":"Provide proper training to janitorial staff on effective cleaning and sterilization practices. Use cleaning products that are known to be effective against the specific pathogen.","Technologies":"Use of UV sterilization technology, antimicrobial surfaces, and disinfecting robots.","People":"Building occupants, janitorial staff","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance team."},{"Description":"Removal of shared and reusable resources may reduce the risk of surface contamination, but if not replaced with adequate alternatives, it may lead to dissatisfaction among building occupants.","Impact":"Reduced convenience for building occupants, potential dissatisfaction, and non-compliance with the measures.","Mitigation":"Provide alternative resources or amenities that are single-use or easily sanitized. Communicate the reasons for the changes to building occupants.","Technologies":"Automatic hand dryers, disposable towels, and single-use slippers.","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance team."},{"Description":"Limited occupancy measures may not be effectively enforced without proper control measures or technologies, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of physical interactions and disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding, physical interactions, and disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement automated occupancy monitoring systems, use electronic counters, and enforce strict occupancy limits through access control systems.","Technologies":"Electronic counters, occupancy monitoring systems, access control systems.","People":"Building occupants, facility management","Owner":"Building management or facility maintenance team."}]}
